title: M8: Best of n
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: elementary. * SUPERVISION: self-assessment. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 1 minute. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: the N-best list is explained in chapter 8 of the book. If you are using MutNMT, the n-best list can be seen in the Inspect section as it is part of the internal information available during the translation process.
